Definition.WordDefinition: Carlsbad, CA (city, FIPS 11194) Location: 33.12383 N, 117.28587 W Population (1990): 63126 (27235 housing units) Area: 97.6 sq km (land), 8.3 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 92008, 92009 Carlsbad, NM (city, FIPS 12150) Location: 32.40416 N, 104.23661 W Population (1990): 24952 (10575 housing units) Area: 70.6 sq km (land), 0.1 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 88220 Carlsbad, TX Zip code(s): 76934
Carlsbad n : a town in southeastern New Mexico on the Pecos River near the Mexican border; potash deposits
